inclusion.criterion: histologically or cytologically confirmed carcinoma of the head and neck region
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: metastatic or locally recurrent squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all sites of disease must be assessed and designated as measurable or non-measurable disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients may have prior chemotherapy for recurrent/metastatic disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients must have adequate bone marrow reserve
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients must have adequate hepatic function
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all patients must be 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients must have a Zubrod performance of 0-3
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: active or uncontrolled infection, recent myocardial infection, unstable angina, or life-threatening arrhythmia
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and prior XRT to neck. However, patient is not eligible due to prior therapy with Abraxane.
